# Package for class10 with plus10 method
A class10 - able to add to memory 10!

## Installation
pip install izypack4class10

## Usage
from izypack4class10 import class10<br/>
a = class10()<br/>
_Initializing memory is set to zero_<br/>
a.plus10()<br/>
a.memory<br/>
_Should see 10!_<br/>
a.plus10()<br/>
a.memory<br/>
_Should see 20!_
